job.name: TpcRS
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 set file = $INPUTFILE0; set rung = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then # root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"MC.y2012,StiCA,KFVertex,TpcRS,phys_off,-evout,NoRunco,NoTags,noHistos,sdt20120425,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,'rung.${rung}'",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"MC.y2012,StiCA,KFVertex,TpcRS,phys_off,sdt20120502,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,,-evout,NoRunco,NoTags,noHistos,-geantOut,'rung.${rung}'",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
